meanings.definition: A piece of art made by sticking various different materials such as photographs and pieces of paper or fabric onto a backing.
meanings.sent1: She created a beautiful collage using old magazines and colored paper.
meanings.sent2: The collage displayed at the art exhibition was truly captivating.
meanings.sent3: The cat made a collage of torn paper as a playful mess on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collage of memories, each one distinct and colorful.
meanings.sent5: The collage of emotions in her eyes told a story of its own.

meanings.definition: A combination or collection of various things.
meanings.sent1: The garden was a collage of flowers, each adding to its beauty.
meanings.sent2: His room was a collage of posters, reflecting his diverse interests.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket held a delicious collage of fruits and sandwiches.
meanings.sent4: The city was a collage of sounds, blending into a symphony of urban life.
meanings.sent5: Her wardrobe was a colorful collage of different styles and patterns.
